class SequentialRNN[source]

SequentialRNN(*args) :: Sequential

A sequential pytorch module that passes the reset call to its children.

Classification Models

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class SentenceEncoder[source]

SentenceEncoder(bptt, module, pad_idx=1, max_len=None) :: Module

Create an encoder over module that can process a full sentence.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

{% include warning.html content='This module expects the inputs padded with most of the padding first, with the sequence beginning at a round multiple of bptt (and the rest of the padding at the end). Use pad_input_chunk to get your data in a suitable format.' %}

masked_concat_pool(output, mask, bptt)

Pool MultiBatchEncoder outputs into one vector [last_hidden, max_pool, avg_pool]
